title: 229: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: HOMETOWNS & TEA
itunes:title: 229: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: HOMETOWNS & TEA
description:
The Broads are recapping Matt’s Hometown dates, but first discuss some current Bachelor News (Chris Harrison on Cameo, the WTA, Matt’s latest statement regarding Rachael and Chris Harrison, Dale/Clare, Peter/Kelly, Hannah Brown’s brother/Jed’s ex)! Then they chat about Michelle’s precious family, Rachael’s fall, Bri’s “I’m falling in love with you”, Serena getting the ick, and a whole lot of tangents! 

PETITION TO REMOVE CHRIS HARRISON FROM THE FRANCHISE:https://tinyurl.com/ytmnva84

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
